rule: The "Company names:" section must appear first in the output before any other sections.
input: Text: The recent developments at Meta and Amazon were overseen by Mark Zuckerberg.

The text discusses recent developments, which can be considered as a specific topic related to the content. It is also complete enough to contain relevant entities and is presented in a human-readable format in an understandable language. Therefore, the input complies with all parts of the input specification.

No violation.
OK
